lines.gurmukhi: ClnI mY jYsy dyKIAq hY Anyk iCdR krY krvw kI inMdw kYsy bin AwvY jI
lines.transliteration_english: Chhalanee Mai Jaisay Daykheeat Hai Anayk Chhidra , Karai Karavaa Kee Nindaa Kaisay Bani Aavai Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a sieve has so many holes and if it slanders an earthen pot, then how can it be respected.

lines.gurmukhi: ibrK ibQUr BrpUr bhu sUrn sY kmlY ktIlo khY khU n suhwvY jI
lines.transliteration_english: Birakh Bidoor Bharapoor Bahu Sooran Sai , Kamalai Kateelo Kahai Kahoo N Suhaavai Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as an acacia tree which is full of thorns call a lotus flower thorny, this allegation will not be appreciated by anyone.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy auphwsu krY bwiesu mrwl pRiq Cwif mukqwhl dRugMD ilv lwvY jI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Oupahaasu Karai Baaisu Maraal Prati , Chhaadi Moukataahal Drougandh Liv Laavai Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as leaving pearls, a filth-eating crow cracks a joke on swan, the eater of pearls of lake Mansarover, this is nothing but his dirtiness.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy hau mhw AprwDI AprwiD BirE skl sMswr ko ibkwr moih BwvY jI ]512]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Hau Mahaa Aparaadhee Aparaadhi Bhariao , Sakal Sansaar Ko Bikaar Mohi Bhaavai Jee ?512?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly sin-filled I, am a big sinner. The sin of slandering the whole world pleases me.  (512)
